title: Pinnacle Dazzle DVD Recorder HD | Video Capture Device + Video Editing Software [PC Disc]
description: Give your video new life with Dazzle® DVD Recorder HD video capture card! Capture clips from multiples sources with the high-quality video capture device. Then turn them into creative movies you can enjoy on DVD, the web, and popular devices. The Dazzle® DVD Recorder HD captures video from VHS, Hi8 and V8 cameras, and other analog sources, including game systems* and even DVD players. Once you've captured your video, get creative with Pinnacle Studio for Dazzle. This powerful video-editor includes all the tools, titles and transitions you need to create movies that your family and friends will love.
